**Previous series**

Archive of the reading series from the joint biostatistics journal club of the [CEB (Clinical epidemiology and biostatistics)](http://ceb-institute.org/ceb) and the [Swiss TPH (Tropical and public health)](https://www.swisstph.ch/en/) institutes between spring 2017 and winter 2018.
